articles.title: Mi QLED TV 4K With UHD, Dolby Vision Display Launched in India by Xiaomi: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Mi QLED TV 4K has been launched in India, Xiaomi's first QLED tech television in the country, and its most premium offering yet for the market. The new Mi TV has a 55-inch Ultra-HD QLED screen, and is powered by Android TV and PatchWall.
